mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICKNAME , MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_TEL , MEMBER_ADDRESS , PROFILE_IMG , AUTHORITY , TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') AS ENROLL_DATE FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND MEMBER_PW = #{memberPW}
